name: Atomic Melt
description:
Playing as a snowball, your journey is to avoid a nuclear disaster, because deep inside yourself, there is an atomic bomb. You're the only reason why it isn't exploding, so you need keep cold, carry as much snow as you can and get to the water as fast as possible.

This Game was created in the Unreal Engine 4 Spring Jam 2020. All assets and systems, except the list below, where created in five days by myself as a single developer.
